programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: In 1999, Kevin found himself in the real world with no real job skills and a strong desire to work an hour a day. What to do? Inspired by nights on the couch watching TV comedians, Kevin decided to head over to nearby Madison, WI and try the “Open-Mic Night”. Thirteen years later Kevin is still going on-stage, and he has found the job that fit his requirements. “For an hour a night I'm wildly successful”. With a smooth and clever style, a great smile and a contagious laugh Kevin has been entertaining in clubs and colleges across the country. In 2000 he was the winner of the Midwest region of the HBO “Comedy Competition” and flew to Los Angeles to compete as a finalist. He performed on Comedy Central's “Premium Blend” in 2003, and finished 2nd in the Boston Comedy Competition in 2005. He was a semi-finalist on NBC's “Last Comic Standing” in 2010. This past summer he co-starred in the Indie film “Flat Chested” starring Alicia Witt and Luke Perry. He currently resides in Chicago.

programme.title: Jay Stevens
programme.desc: Jay Stevens has been a professional comedian for almost 20 years. Growing up, he was known as a hilarious outgoing character by friends, family, colleagues and those he would meet on a first encounter.

programme.title: Kellen Erskine
programme.desc: Kellen Erskine was featured on season 7 of NBC's America's Got Talent. His jokes have appeared in many publications including the Reader's Digest. Kellen has been a finalist of both the San Francisco International Comedy Competition and the Great American Comedy Festival. This year he performed at the prestigious Bridgetown Comedy Festival in Portland, Oregon. Kellen opens regularly for Frank Caliendo of FOX's NFL Sunday.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.sub-title: Caleb Elliott: Diary of a Smooth Black Kid
programme.desc: One of DryBar's youngest comics, Caleb Elliot proves that age is anything but a setback.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: Bill Campbell is not as young as he used to be. Egos are lost in translation, contact lenses are replaced by magic markers, and garage sales are negotiated cent-by-cent.

programme.title: David Crowe
programme.desc: David Crowe is a 20 year veteran of the comedy stage. After winning both the Seattle and San Francisco Comedy Competitions, then performing for a US President the same year, his career took off and has never stopped. On stage Crowe is armed with a "gallery of facial expressions", a host of accents and a "nerdy charisma that is utterly captivating." He has been featured on Showtime with his own One Hour Comedy Special "Crooked Finger," along with numerous appearances on Comedy Central, Bob&Tom Radio, SiriusXM and Pandora. Overseas, he crushed the competition at the Edinburgh International Fringe Festival garnering three perfect 5-Star reviews from their rather sticky and jaded press (you can read them here in the Testimonials section). David is a guaranteed hit on the corporate entertainment circuit. He has performed at literally hundreds of corporate and private events across the United States and Canada. (See "Past Client" list under Testimonials). He recently concluded a nationwide comedy tour for Investors Group, a financial services company, where he performed for over 60,000 of their most valued clients in 60 different cities. To date, David has released five comedy albums. He believes the best way to stay sharp and relevant is to continue to hone and perfect new material at comedy clubs across the country with the goal of releasing an new comedy special every few years.

programme.desc: A Queens couple who specialize in robbing Mafia social clubs stumble upon their biggest score and become targets of the mob and the FBI. Starring Andy Garcia, Ray Romano and Michael Pitt.

programme.title: Snowman's Pass
programme.desc: Still struggling to accept her fiancé's death in a rock climbing accident, mountain guide DIANA PENNINGTON gratefully accepts industrialist CURT SEAVER's offer to find the body using a new satellite imagery technology his company has developed. But while traversing the legendary "Snowman's Pass" with Curt and his companions HUGO and TYLER, Diana is horrified to discover the search for her fiancé is a decoy they are in fact hunting for a fallen spy satellite, property of an enemy foreign power.

programme.title: Secret Liaison
programme.desc: A woman travels from Los Angeles to Seattle to try to prevent her sister from going to prison for murder.

programme.title: Christmas With A Prince
programme.desc: Pediatric specialist Tasha Miller is caring for two young patients plus one sinfully gorgeous royal. She knew Prince Alexander at boarding school long ago and thinks he's still a self-absorbed, incorrigible heartbreaker.

programme.title: Joy & Hope
programme.desc: Romance author Ethan Dulane's writer's block compromises his ninth novel delivery deadline under contract, so his agent booked an inspirational holiday away from his Manhattan luxury apartment, on a horse ranch upstate.

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin
programme.desc: Tintin and his friends discover directions to a sunken ship commanded by Capt. Haddock's ancestor and go off on a treasure hunt.

programme.title: Earth to Echo
programme.desc: After receiving a bizarre series of encrypted messages, a group of kids embark on an adventure with an alien who needs their help.

programme.title: Star Trek Beyond
programme.desc: On a rescue mission, the USS Enterprise is attacked by Krall, a warlord sworn against the Federation. Crashed on an uncharted world, the crew must join forces with Jaylah, a rebellious alien warrior, to escape and stop Krall from triggering all-out war.

programme.title: I Walk Alone
programme.desc: After taking the rap for his partner, a mobster is released from prison to find his former partner entranched in a swank night club with no intention of sharing the riches.

programme.title: Houdini
programme.desc: Tony Curtis gives a winning performance as the great Houdini, the struggling circus performer who emerged as the world's most captivating magician and escape artist.

programme.title: Roman Holiday
programme.desc: Audrey Hepburn's portrayal of a modern-day princess, rebelling against the royal obligations, who explores Rome on her own. This romantic comedy ranks as one of the most enjoyable films of all times.

programme.title: Retrograde
programme.desc: Two opposing time travelers are sent back to the present to prevent a global biological disaster from occurring.

programme.title: Edison
programme.desc: Upon discovering a den of corrupt policemen, a journalist (Justin Timberlake) joins forces with his editor (Morgan Freeman) and a renowned private detective (Kevin Spacey) to bring the force down.

programme.title: Shark Lake
programme.desc: Action legend Dolph Lundgren goes head to head with a bloodthirsty shark that has a resort town under siege.

programme.title: Kill Switch
programme.desc: A psychopathic killer is ravaging Memphis, Tennesse by murdering young women and Detective Jacob Stillwell is on the case. Known as the resident tough cop due to his aggressive tactics, he gets knocked sideways when his girlfriend becomes one of the murder victims. With his partner, Storm Anderson, in tow, Jacob casts the rules aside and infiltrates the seedy criminal underworld of the city looking to avenge his lover's death and put an end to the killings.

programme.title: Burn
programme.desc: From executive producer Denis Leary, BURN is an action-packed documentary about Detroit told through the eyes of firefighters charged with the task of saving a city that many have written off.

programme.title: Chop & Steele
programme.desc: Lifelong friends Joe Pickett and Nick Prueher, two comedians famous for pranking local news stations on live television as the fake strongman duo 'Chop & Steele,' find themselves in federal court with a vengeful media conglomerate after their latest morning show stunt goes viral.

programme.title: The YouTube Effect
programme.desc: Director Alex Winter explores the ascension and acceleration of YouTube, a video-sharing website that started with humble origins and has gone on to change how we experience the world. With exclusive access to some of YouTube's biggest stars, the film presents an eye-opening and troubling look at the platform now so powerfully embedded in our lives.

programme.title: Side By Side
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves takes an in-depth look at the future of digital cinema, featuring interviews with cinematic masters James Cameron, David Fincher, David Lynch, Martin Scorsese, Steven Soderbergh and more.

programme.title: Soulful and Funny
programme.desc: Get ready for some island vibes, as Crystal takes you down to Houston where we're introduced to Just Oxtails in Missouri City, Texas. Locally owned and operated, Just Oxtails has been a local staple for the last twenty years where they've built a brand on “Just Oxtails!” Then we're joined by comedienne Lotto Marie who brings the laughs about her mid-west upbringing.

programme.title: Soulful and Funny
programme.desc: Continuing our tour of Missouri City in Houston, Texas, Crystal takes us to Micheaux's a local restaurant that made a name for themselves during the pandemic by giving back to the community through their “Everybody Eats” program. Owner Mr. Mischeaux serves up traditional southern Louisiana family recipes that include their signature Salmon, Five Cheese Macaroni & Cheese, and Peach Cobbler. Then, Crystal is joined by local comic Lady Rico for joyful tasting, followed by a return to the Bodega with a special set from Lady Rico.

programme.title: Thanksgiving With The Carters
programme.desc: A family tries to find common ground with its newest members, as they honor their tradition of Thanksgiving surprise, where each person attempts to surprise the family with something unique and positive.

programme.title: A Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: Well-established blues singer, Miracle, has everything anyone could ask for, but fails to appreciate it. When an accident forces her to confront her past, she must face the music. It will take A Christmas Miracle for her to count her blessings.

programme.title: Murder is the Crime
programme.desc: A deranged serial killer is on the loose killing women in Harlem, until an elite homicide squad and detective are on the case.

programme.title: Tainted Waters
programme.desc: An unknowingly selfish mechanic, unable to financially save his failing business, agrees to take part in a four man robbery. Now hiding out from the cops, he has to make it through the night in a room of people where he's not the most selfish.

programme.title: Christmas in The Heartland
programme.desc: Kara and Jessie strike up an unlikely friendship when seated next to each other on a plane headed to the heartland. With both girls visiting family they've never met, they devise a plan to switch places for Christmas.

programme.title: Dear Santa
programme.desc: A young woman who comes from a life of privilege falls for the owner of a soup kitchen after discovering a Dear Santa letter written by his seven year old daughter.

programme.title: Christmas on Holly Lane
programme.desc: Life-long best friends Sarah, Cat and Riley reunite in Sarah's childhood home to cook up some Christmas magic and save the holidays for their families. With each friend at a different crossroad, they will all have to come together to rediscover the Christmas magic that can only happen in the house on Holly Lane.

programme.title: Christmas in the City
programme.desc: With the threat of having to close her father's candy store, Wendy and her six-year-old daughter Grace travel to the big city in hopes of making extra holiday cash to save the store.

programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: A U.S. Army tank crew joins a band of stragglers in a desperate search for water in the war-torn North African desert.

programme.title: Let's Do It Again
programme.desc: A couple faces divorce after a wife's plan to teach her unfaithful husband a lesson backfires.

programme.title: It Should Happen To You
programme.desc: A publicity-hungry actress uses a Manhattan billboard to jumpstart her career.

programme.title: Divorce American Style
programme.desc: About a nouveau-riche Los Angeles couple who, after 17 years of marriage, decide to call it quits.

programme.title: Eat A Bowl Of Tea
programme.desc: A Chinese-American and his wife face a clash of cultures in post-WWII New York's Chinatown.

programme.title: Fresh Horses
programme.desc: A safely conservative college senior meets a country girl who changes the course of his life.

programme.title: Convicted
programme.desc: Fact-based story about a Tennessee letter carrier who was falsely convicted of a rape however, his legal problems continue even after the real rapist confesses.

programme.title: Passions
programme.desc: A man with a wife and daughter also has a son with another woman. When he dies this little secret is revealed to the wife.

programme.title: Beyond the Sacramento
programme.desc: Gunfire and lawlessness rule the land in California until "Wild Bill Hickok" (Bill Elliott) comes along to clean it up. Fast action and plenty of fighting in this western which has Elliott saving a frontier town from Bradley Page and Frank LaRue.

programme.title: Desert Vigilante
programme.desc: Charles Starrett stars as a federal agent assigned to stop the illegal flow of silver from Mexico into the U.S. The lawman soon figures out that the local U.S. attorney, Tristram Coffin, is in cahoots with the smugglers. After a few chases and shootouts, Starrett fulfills his mission.

programme.title: Fort Ti
programme.desc: A band of famed Indian fighters join British forces for an assault on the French at Fort Ticonderoga.

programme.title: The Texas Rangers
programme.desc: Carver, the fastest gun in the West, leads his men in pursuit of the notorious Sam Bass gang.

programme.title: Major Dundee
programme.desc: A Union officer in charge of a jail in the Southwest enlists prisoners to fight against renegade Apaches.

programme.title: Duel at Diablo
programme.desc: Frontier scout Jess Remsberg leads a wagon train through hostile territory to Fort Conchos. But underneath his valor, he has an ulterior motive: to settle a score with the man he believes killed his wife. James Garner and Sidney Poitier star.

programme.title: Return of the Seven
programme.desc: Starring Yul Brynner and a stellar supporting cast that includes Robert Fuller, Warren Oates, and Claude Akins, this classic western adventure follows the legendary Magnificent Seven as they thunder through Mexico to face the shootout of their lives!

programme.title: Dances With Wolves
programme.desc: After encountering and eventually being accepted by a Native American tribe, Dunbar's loyalties are put to the test when the army threatens his new home, forcing him to choose between white America or the natives he now calls his people.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas looks for answers when recovering alcoholic Micah Torrence returns to the bottle and turns in his badge.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas, Mark and Micah tangle with the Newman family and learn the secret of a town's 20-year-old mystery.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Blinded in an explosion, Lucas fights despair as he prepares for a meeting with a gun-toting enemy.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A deranged ex-prisoner of war, cruelly abused in a Northern army prison, captures Lucas, locks him in a cage and vows to make him suffer for his part in the Civil War.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A traveling salesman can't talk his way out of an assault charge.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas is threatened with hanging by a lynch party when some horses he has purchased in a neighboring town turn out to be stolen.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A janitor-turned-gunfighter's reputation hangs on one lucky shot and a lot of gall. The handyman finds himself in trouble when he accidentally kills another gunfighter.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas tries to get help when he is shot after witnessing a murder.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas tries to get help when he is shot after witnessing a murder.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: After being foreman of a jury that convicted an Apache, Lucas is marked for death. Now, he must discover who is behind the curse.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas allows some snowed-in stagecoach passengers to stay with him until the roads are passable. Trouble brews when the whisky salesman and gunfighter fall for the same woman.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Two pranksters write away for a mail-order bride, using Lucas's name.

programme.title: Mr. Zoo: The Missing VIP
programme.desc: Top National Security agent and zoophobe Tae-ju suddenly receives an ability to talk to the animals after a freak accident.

programme.title: The Recon
programme.desc: One day at early dawn, a search unit near the DMZ, the front line, is on alert. It was because a soldier from another unit's GP ran away to DMZ with a gun. Under Commander Baek, the 3rd platoon members led by First Lieutenant Cho are put into the operation to arrest the deserter. The search begins, and at the same time, First Lieutenant Lim's dead body is found at the unit's official residence. The accident is reported to the Division Headquarters and Captain Kang, who is about to be discharged, arrives at the search unit with an army surgeon. The commander and the army surgeon are rushing to conclude Lim's case with suicide, but Kang suspects that there is a deep secret in this accident. At that time, the soldiers who were put into the operations get killed one by one, and the dark truth between Lim's death and the deserter search operation is revealed.

programme.title: Midnight Runners (HELLBOUND's Ryu Kyung-Soo)
programme.desc: Ki-joon and Hee-yeol decide to investigate the kidnapping incident with zero experience in real investigation.

programme.title: Monster
programme.desc: Bok-Soon tries to take revenge on her sister's killer, Tae-Soo, while he also tries to silence her for good.

programme.title: Katy Perry
programme.desc: The Prismatic World Tour is a sensory explosion of eye-popping theatrics, daring acrobatics and of course, all the hits. This concert film is a visually stunning production that captures Katy's fun-loving personality and artistic vision. Spanning the entire length of the arena floor, the innovative Prismatic tour stage allows Katy to share intimate moments with her fans in a unique shared connection with the music. Directed for the stage in seven thematic acts, this unmissable spectacle features hit after hit after hit. The World Tour captures the excitement, color and energy of the live Katy Perry extravaganza.

programme.title: Fuego en la Sangre Capítulo 72
programme.desc: Gabriela cae en la manipulación de Fernando y sufre por su amor. Anselmo regresa buscando a Rosario para llevársela. Juan le cuenta a Sofía como murieron sus padres.

programme.title: Teresa Capítulo 69
programme.desc: Arturo le cuestiona a Teresa su pasado junto a Mariano. Martín le pregunta a Mariano si ve a Aurora como amiga o como mujer. Arturo le pide a Teresa que vayan juntos a ver a Mariano para que le cuente cómo fue su relación.

programme.title: Teresa Capítulo 70
programme.desc: Refugio le reclama a Teresa haberse acostado con Mariano sin haber estado casada. Arturo intenta pedirle perdón a Teresa pero ella lo rechaza. Para que lo perdone, Arturo vuelve a Teresa su socia en el despacho.

programme.title: Teresa Capítulo 71
programme.desc: Teresa le pide a Arturo esperar un poco para tener un hijo. El papá de Aurora duda en decirle la verdad sobre el paradero de su madre. Aída y Mariano deciden dejar fluir su relación.

programme.title: Teresa Capítulo 72
programme.desc: Teresa busca a Mariano y terminan declarándose su amor nuevamente, Aída llega y los interrumpe. Mariano le hace ver a Teresa que puede estar con ella y con Aída sin ningún compromiso.

programme.title: Tres Veces Ana Capítulo 69
programme.desc: Ramiro y Ana Laura le revelan a Ernestina que Marcelo le pidió el divorcio a Ana Leticia. Soledad le cuenta su historia a Nerina, ella le advierte que la verdad pronto saldrá a la luz. Valentín le asegura a Marcelo que se vengará de él.

programme.title: Tres Veces Ana Capítulo 70
programme.desc: Ana Lucía, Ana Laura y Ana Leticia sueñan la misma noche sobre el accidente que les arrebató la vida a sus padres. Ana Leticia le pide a Marcelo que le dé una oportunidad a su matrimonio. Ramiro es secuestrado en un parque.

programme.title: Tres Veces Ana Capítulo 71
programme.desc: Marcelo le asegura a Ana Leticia que le dará una oportunidad a su matrimonio. Marcelo se escapa del hospital. Marcelo se encuentra con Evaristo, quien amenaza con matar a Ramiro si no obtiene la segunda llave de la caja de seguridad de Rafael.

programme.title: Marimar Capítulo 30
programme.desc: Bella toma la decisión de ir a trabajar al club de Valle Encantado para solucionar los negocios de Gustavo. Bella se presenta ante Bernardo para conocer los detalles del club.

programme.title: María la del Barrio Capítulo 39
programme.desc: Tita comienza a sospechar que María tiene un amante por lo que investiga y la sigue. María le confiesa a Agripina que ella es la madre de Nandito.

programme.title: María la del Barrio Capítulo 40
programme.desc: Tita sufre porque cree que María tiene un amante, por lo que cita a Nandito para descubrir la verdad. Soraya conoce a Alicia y a su padre y a quien planea conquistar.

programme.title: María Mercedes Capítulo 19
programme.desc: Malvina se escabulle en la habitación de Santiago y encuentra un dinero escondido. Jorge Luis confiesa que pese a todo no puede odiar a María Mercedes.

programme.title: María Mercedes Capítulo 20

programme.title: Marimar Capítulo 31

programme.title: Marimar Capítulo 32

programme.title: María la del Barrio Capítulo 41

programme.title: Triunfo del Amor Capítulo 64

programme.title: Mañana Es Para Siempre Capítulo 37

programme.title: María de Todos Los Ángeles
programme.desc: La inauguración de la fonda de Carmelito está en riesgo de ser cancelada debido a que María perdió el permiso de salubridad y arruinó la comida que iban a ofrecer, pero cuando todo parece perdido, Doña Lucha llega para salvar el día.

programme.title: Una familia de diez

programme.title: Una familia de diez
programme.desc: Renata está harta de que nadie le ayude en los quehaceres de la casa, por lo que decide ya no hacer la limpieza. Averigua cómo quedará el departamento, ahora que se ha liberado.

programme.title: Rebelde
programme.desc: Pedro regala una foto de su madre a Mía. Vico tiene encuentros románticos con Tomás. Tras descubrir que le mintió, Franco se enfrenta a Miguel. Mia presenta su coreografía, pero Roberta y Miguel irrumpen en el baile demostrando su talento.

programme.title: Rebelde

programme.title: Rebelde
programme.desc: Roberta consigue esconder a Marcelino. Tomás convence a Pilar de fingir una relación. Roberta lee su redacción delante del grupo y León se da cuenta del ataque y se enfrenta a ella. Teo encuentra la marca de la logia en la habitación de Miguel.

programme.title: Rebelde
programme.desc: Pascual resta importancia al ataque de la logia. León lleva a los perros a buscar a Marcelino pero estos atacan a Jose. Franco le ofrece trabajo a Miguel. Mia descubre que Vico no está viendo a Diego sino a otra persona y la enfrenta por mentirle.

programme.title: Rebelde
programme.desc: Vico le confiesa a Mia su relación con Tomás. Mia y Roberta buscan a Lupita y la convencen de que regrese a la escuela. La logia tortura a Miguel para que abandone el colegio. Miguel le confiesa a Nico que no se irá, a pesar de las amenazas.

programme.title: Rebelde
programme.desc: Pascual convoca al comité escolar, lo que pone en peligro la escapada al antro, pero Diego ayuda a Roberta a convencer a todos de que vayan. Mía, tratando de dar celos a Miguel, acepta la invitación de Giovanni. Diego besa a Roberta tratando de vengarse.

programme.title: Rebelde
programme.desc: Celina se emborracha por Miguel. Los estudiantes son castigados por escaparse del colegio. Giovanni le dice a Diego que Tomás le quiere bajar a Vico.

programme.desc: Sofía regresa a su casa con Juan para no perder su amor, él promete esperar el tiempo que sea necesario para acercarse a ella.

programme.title: Fuego en la Sangre Capítulo 65
programme.desc: Eva les confiesa a Sarita y Jimena que Rosario es su hermana. Rosario decide alejarse de Franco para que Sarita no la odie más.

programme.title: La inocente
programme.desc: La inocencia de una mujer por un déficit, se convertirá en la peor pesadilla para sus seres queridos, después de que la cruda realidad del mundo exterior no la respetó y la convirtió en su víctima.

programme.title: Mamá, soy Paquito
programme.desc: Paquito vive con su madre en la pobreza y por ello canta para ganar dinero y poder darle una buena vida. La madre de Paquito muere y ahora él busca el amor de su padre, el cual es un hombre muy rico y a la vez despreciable.

programme.title: El día de las madres
programme.desc: Tres madres sufren al ver a sus hijos crecer, enfrentarse a los retos de la vida, enamorarse, cumplir sus sueños y luchar por salir adelante. A pesar de las adversidades, los muchachos celebran el 10 de mayo con la mujer más importante de sus vidas.

programme.title: Las rosas del milagro
programme.desc: Juan Diego es un indígena a quien la Virgen de Guadalupe elige para llevar un mensaje a un obispo. El obispo no cree en Juan Diego respecto a la virgen. Después de cuatro visitas de Juan Diego, el obispo le cree al ver a la Virgen en un manto.

programme.title: Enamorada
programme.desc: El general Reyes se enamora de la bella y rica Beatriz Peñafiel. Beatriz no controla bien sus sentimientos y después de un paso a la curiosidad finalmente acepta el profundo y auténtico amor que siente hacía él.

programme.title: María Candelaria
programme.desc: María Candelaria y Lorenzo Rafael quieren casarse pero no tienen dinero. María Candelaria enferma y Lorenzo Rafael roba medicina para curarla. Él va a la cárcel y ella muere apedreada por los lugareños, quienes piensan que posó desnuda para un pintor.

programme.title: Salón México
programme.desc: Mercedes trabaja como bailarina en un cabaret para poder pagar la exclusiva escuela para señoritas a la que asiste su hermana Beatriz. Pero cuando Paco, su explotador, le roba una gran cantidad de dinero, Mercedes decide no aguantar ni un maltrato más.

programme.title: Los olvidados
programme.desc: Un grupo de delincuentes juveniles vive una vida violenta y llena de crímenes en los barrios marginales de la ciudad de México, y la moral del joven Pedro es gradualmente corrompida y destruida por los demás.

programme.title: Los de abajo

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.sub-title: Aún no ensillamos y ya cabalgamos
programme.desc: Un adolescente siente que ir a la escuela es una pérdida de tiempo y quiere trabajar para ganar dinero. Su tío le da una oportunidad de trabajar, pero el joven comienza a volverse irresponsable y su madre tendrá que hacerle ver la realidad.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.sub-title: 'No supe de duelos hasta que junte mis hijos con los tuyos'
programme.desc: Dos chicas terminan su amistad debido a una fuerte pelea, las cosas se complican cuando sus padres se enamoran y tienen que vivir todos juntos en la misma casa.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.sub-title: 'Quien de tu mal no te advierte, mal te quiere'
programme.desc: Un joven sueña con ser DJ, pero debe lidiar con la extrema disciplina de su abuelo, quien quedó a cargo de él después de la muerte de sus padres. El joven y su abuelo tendrán que aprender a convivir respetando sus diferencias.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.sub-title: 'A amor mal correspondido, ausencia y olvido'
programme.desc: Una joven tiene una relación con un hombre casado a pesar de que su padre y su amiga se oponen. Poco a poco la joven se va dando cuenta de las falsas promesas de su amante y comienza a aprender que no debe depender de nadie.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.sub-title: 'La salud no tiene precio y el que la arriesga es un necio'
programme.desc: Una madre primeriza decide hacerle caso a su amiga y no vacunar a su hijo, pues cree que puede ser contraproducente para el bebé, sin saber que su decisión pondrá en riesgo la salud del pequeño.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.sub-title: 'No hay peor sordo que el que no quiere oir'
programme.desc: Para sentirse amada, una joven trata de ganarse el corazón de un chico haciendo siempre lo que él le pide, llevándola a los excesos y sin hacer caso de advertencias. Los padres de la joven se darán cuenta muy tarde del error en el que estaba su hija.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.sub-title: 'Amor de madre, ni la nieve lo hace enfriarse'
programme.desc: Una joven se ve afectada por las constantes discusiones entre sus padres y la indiferencia de su novio. La joven al sentirse decepcionada de su madre y amigos, decide alejarse de todo y se va de la casa.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.desc: Un joven sale de prisión y trata de ayudar a su hermano a ser una buena persona, pero sus planes no saldrán como esperaba y ambos aprenderán una gran lección.

programme.title: Building the Dream

programme.title: Open House
programme.desc: Get a closer look at unique and personalized spaces in NYC as Designer David Mann shows off his dapper East Side apartment a tour of a Soho stunner filled with color and light.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati visits Culiacán, the capital of Sinaloa. Founded in 1531, Culiacán is the center of trade for produce, meat, and fish. Locals pride themselves on the produce cultivated from the land and nearby sea. Celebrated chef and culinary ambassador Miguel Taniyama takes Pati to the best markets, street food stands, and restaurants. In her kitchen, Pati creates recipes inspired by the experience.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.sub-title: Altata, Hidden Gem by the Sea of Cortez
programme.desc: Altata is a small coastal town with stretches of beautiful beaches. Pati meets locals and chefs as the town embarks on a journey to reinvent itself from sleepy fishing village to tourist destination. She takes a boat ride to sample fresh oysters right from the water and visits restaurants serving fresh seafood. At home, Pati prepares a seafood feast based on the bountiful waters of the Altata Bay.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati heads to Los Mochis, a coastal city in the northern region of Sinaloa that was founded by Americans in the late 1800s. After learning its unique history and getting an incredibly delicious tour of the street food, Pati returns to her kitchen to create two mouth-watering taco recipes that take her right back to those street stands in Los Mochis.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Sinaloa's premiere resort town has 13-miles of beautiful coastline and some of the best restaurants in Mexico. But Mazatlán has overcome a complicated history. Pati meets two close friends, chefs Luis Osuna and Zahie Tellez – both witnessed the evolution of Mazatlán firsthand. They each give her a personal tour of the city, and chef Luis takes Pati to his family's restaurant, Panamá.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati is in El Fuerte, one of Mexico's "Pueblos Mágicos" or magic towns. Now a quiet colonial town, El Fuerte was the most important commercial and agricultural center in northwest Mexico for over 300 years. After a walking tour and a stop at the Hotel Posada Hidalgo to try their famous cauques, a unique local shellfish, Pati creates a few lobster recipes in her kitchen.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati travels into the mountains of Sinaloa to the tiny village of Jinetes. The small population of barely 100 people live on whatever the land gives them. Miles and miles removed from civilization, they've managed to preserve their customs and recipes for generations. Pati is the first visitor to come learn from their culinary traditions and they've prepared a feast fit for the occasion.

programme.title: MIX
programme.desc: Tamee visits an apothecary themed bar in Downtown Los Angeles that whips up lavish cocktails with ingredients pulled straight out of their garden. Head Bartender Nick sports a lab coat, infuses his own spirits & teaches mixology classes at APOTHEKE.

programme.title: MIX
programme.desc: Tamee loves holidays & friends so she's combing both in this MIX HOLIDAY special. Tamee mixes up Mother's Day, July 4th, Thanksgiving drinks with MIX's favorite barman Scott and Apotheke lead mixologist Nick and visits old favorites from the past.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.sub-title: El Chepe, Railway to the Past
programme.desc: The El Chepe railway is a historic passenger train offering stunning views of the Sinaloa countryside and the Copper Canyon. Pati rides the first section of the train's journey, from Los Mochis to El Fuerte, and tastes the gourmet offerings from the train's restaurant, Urike. Back home, the early morning train ride inpsires Pati to make a delicious breakfast based on Sinaloan classics.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Mocorito is known for one of Sinaloa's most beloved recipes: a slow-simmered pork dish called chilorio. Pati visits Victoria Gonzalez, a cook known for having one of the best chilorio recipes. Then she goes with Victoria to see her sister, Fabiola, who specializes in another Sinaloan classic, jamoncillo: a soft candy made of sugar and milk. In her kitchen, Pati perfects her own chilorio recipe.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Celestino Gasca didn't exist until about 30 years ago and is becoming a vacation destination due to its magnificent beaches and idyllic surfing conditions. Pati meets restaurant owner Carmen and helps her cook an iconic Sinaloan dish: pescado zarandeado. Then, she travels to the nearby fishing village Las Barras to learn how to harvest percebes, a tiny crustacean considered a delicacy.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Known as “Mexico's Breadbasket,” Sinaloa produces about 40% of the meat and produce consumed in all of Mexico. Pati travels the countryside to get an up-close look at the wealth of resources Sinaloa has to offer. She visits a dairy farm known for its fresh cheese, tours a high-tech produce farm, and gets a fresh-water fishing lesson from a master fisherman.

programme.title: Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: First, Lou and Froy transform their search for a small dirt bike into a quasi-reality show, getting a group of young smart-asses trapped into their own web. Then, Sonia and Matt head to the business district for a different sort of quarry - a high-end luxury tanning bed owned by a less-than-sympathetic German. And finally, Lou and Matt set up a high stakes sting operation to bust a shady tow-truck driver, but will their best-laid plans go up in smoke?

programme.title: The Dune Buggy
programme.desc: First, Lou and Froy tail an upper class debtor to an upscale restaurant where the food is almost as unpalatable as its clientele's attitude. Then, Lyndah and Froy head to a residential district to repossess a van that is busy being loaded up with stolen electronics by a dangerous pair of criminals. And finally, Matt and Froy head to the desert to sneak an extremely rare top-of-the-line dune buggy from a crew of dedicated off-roaders.

programme.title: High and Low Spirits
programme.desc: First, Lou and Sonia find themselves in the middle of a baffling marital spat involving a man, his wife, and her untrustworthy yoga instructor. Then, Sonia and Lyndah hit the fashion district to repossess a van from a designer who's way ahead of the curve in terms of the fashion world, but way behind on her payments. And finally, Matt and Froy spoil spirits when they head to a carwash to reclaim a vehicle from a group of vicious, scantily-clad sorority girls.

programme.title: Repo Outside the Box
programme.desc: First, Matt and Sonia attempt to repossess a car from a group of cleaver-wielding short-order cooks with a taste for violence. Then, it's trouble in paradise as Matt and Froy take on the task of reclaiming a beach-scene-on-wheels filled with irate models. And finally, Sonia and Matt find themselves outmatched by a well-armed street gang and its charismatic leader.

programme.title: Horse Semen & the Rolls Royce Golf Cart
programme.desc: First, Froy and Sonia head out to the farm to repossess a truck from an entitled equestrian who would rather die than let the repo team get their hands on what's in the back. Then, Lou and Sonia stumble into the middle of a prolonged business dispute between a flower lady and her displeased client. And finally, Sonia and Froy hit the links to reclaim a high-end Rolls Royce golf cart from a snob who thinks he's too good to pay his bills.

programme.title: Involuntary Voluntary
programme.desc: Lou and Matt inadvertently become pawns in an elaborate and misguided lesson perpetrated by a cheating husband upon his mistress. Then, Matt and Lou attempt to take a vehicle away from a debtor who is so drunk he doesn't remember agreeing to give his car away voluntarily. And, Froy and Sonia try to take a limousine away from its shotgun-wielding driver and his two suspiciously-dressed passengers.

programme.title: Froy's Bait and Lou's Cake
programme.desc: Lou and Froy set out some bait in a gated community to attract a security guard who's slow to make his payments, but quick to pull out his pepper spray. Then, Matt and Lou crash a wedding to repo a car from a truant DJ, but will they be able to get away unscathed when the party turns on them? And, Lou and Froy confront a gang of bikers in a back alley. Will the repo team's pleas for patience and calm be enough to overcome the angry bikers' bats and chains?

programme.title: Blow-Up and Cool Down
programme.desc: Lou and Lyndah reclaim a riding mower from a housewife and her grab-happy husband. Then, Sonia and Matt head out on a scorcher of an afternoon for a repossession. Will they be able to beat both the heat and a pair of geriatric debtors? And, Sonia and Lyndah are left without words when they see the dark and embarrassing secret held in the backseat of a debtor's unpaid vehicle.

programme.title: The Car That Rolled Away
programme.desc: Lou and Lyndah try to negotiate a set of keys away from a raucous group of drunken outdoorsmen. Then, Froy and Lyndah repo a vehicle from a unruly and untalented guitarist. Plus, Froy and Sonia bite off more than they can chew when they try to reclaim an SUV from a confused and embittered former football player.

programme.title: Naked and Dangerous
programme.desc: Sonia and Lyndah try to repossess a hot tub away from a group of upset partiers. Then, Lou and Matt try to negotiate with a pair of unintelligible and enraged parade participants. And, Lou and Lyndah must repo a car from a group of old men.

programme.title: Monster of a Problem
programme.desc: Lyndah and Matt confront a confused debtor who is as quick with his questions as he is with his knife. Then, Lou and Lyndah interrupt a seaside party to repo a motorboat away from a gaggle of misguided youths. And, Lou, Froy, and Sonia head to the dirt track to repossess a car from an event promoter. They seem to be able to reason with him, but his monster truck-driving brother with no respect for human life may prove to be a problem.

programme.title: Hooligans and Explosions
programme.desc: Will a frying pan-wielding housewife stop Lou and Sonia from getting their car? Plus, a repo involving a truck filled with black market contraband goes horrifyingly wrong for Matt and Froy.

programme.title: Reading, Painting, and Physical Education
programme.desc: First, Froy and Sonia try to repossess a high-end Corvette from a high-strung librarian. Then, it's some serious sibling rivalry when Matt and Froy come to take a van away from a pair of housepainter brothers. Finally, Lou and Matt get knocked for a loop by a sub-professional baseball team who don't want to lose their bus.

programme.title: Heavy Hitters
programme.desc: It's payback time when Lou, Matt, and Froy stake out the baseball bus that got away and this time, they've got a foolproof plan. Lou, Matt, and Froy head to a late-night construction site to repossess an enormous crane. And, Sonia and Froy face their worst nightmare when a gang of bikers follows them back to the office.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.sub-title: Crane Cannon Launch/Trash Scavenger Hunt/Heli Body Drag
programme.desc: This episode featured four pairs as teams. First, it's the human cannonball. As a truck drives along a pier with a crane hanging off the side, one team member hangs from a crane and then into the water they light the fuse to giant cannon. Their partner is shot out of the cannon and into the water, swim to a boat and clip a flag to a flagpole. The team to finish fastest chooses team to be eliminated. Next, it's a trash can buffet scavenger hunt. Teams dig through dumpsters and barrels to find items. The team to match four items fastest would win a four-day trip to Las Vegas and $20,000. No one would be eliminated. The final stunt is a real drag. Team members hanging on to handlebars attached to a helicopter and are dragged across pavement on their stomachs. They have to let go as close to the finish line as possible. The team to get the least combined distance from the finish line would win $50K. The home invasion stunt goes to Dubuque, Iowa.
